# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups

## Tools

- Run tfsec, checkov, tflint
- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

- Use terraform validate
- Integrate scanning into CI/CD

# Terraform Security Best Practice

## S3

- Use SSE encryption
- Block public access
- Enable logging
- Use bucket policies with conditions

## IAM

- Apply least privilege
- Avoid wildcards
- Use roles instead of long-lived keys

## VPC

- Use private subnets
- Enable flow logs
- Avoid default VPCs

## EC2

- Harden AMIs
- Disable public IPs
- Use dedicated security groups
